name: Rolling for Romance
storyline: Rolling for Romance is a Slice-of-Life dating sim where you find companionship through the magical world of Dungeons and Dragons! Go through your first year of college as you make friends, bond with your fellow club members, and potentially roll your way into one of their hearts!
